p: The hydrodistillation method was modified and magnesium aluminometasilicate as excipient was used. The amount of magnesium aluminometasilicate was based on water quantity, its concentration was from 0.5% to 2%. Fifteen grams of nutmeg seed powder were used and all of the sample ratios of solvent were the same (20:1). The essential oil was obtained and stored in the same conditions. Conditions are mentioned in Table 1.
